name: French New Solitaire
description:
Solitaire with a twist, it has 22 more cards called trumps. And 4 more cards for each suits called knights that are ranked between the jack and the queen. 

Since it's way more difficult I added a column and the possibility to shuffle if you are stuck.

It's just a proof of concept to see if I can create a game and implement different things like adding monetization.

The game has rewarded ads to earn you more shuffles but if you manage to win you get some so it's not necessary.

It has an ad every 2 games played meaning you can reset many times without getting an ad as long as you don't play a card.
